first_para: Michael Tyrone Ellis (born 13 October 1967) is a Conservative Party politician in the UK. He is the MP for the Northampton North constituency having held this office since the May 2010 General Election.

full.extract: Michael Tyrone Ellis (born 13 October 1967) is a Conservative Party politician in the UK. He is the MP for the Northampton North constituency having held this office since the May 2010 General Election.
full.title: Michael Ellis (British politician)
